channel.title: move () steps :: Introduction to Scratch
channel.description: The move () steps blocks moves a sprite in the direction it is currently facing. Each step corresponds to one unit on the stage. Notes The movement of this block is immediate. If you want the movement to be animated over time, use a glide block or repeat the move () steps alternated with a wait () seconds block. See the animated movement design pattern for details. The direction of the sprite may not correspond with the artwork of the sprite.
